title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, September 6, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of Alice Sebold (1963), who gets up every day at 4 a.m. to write because, she says, “If you start in the dark, the judges are all asleep.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Alice Sebold (1963), who gets up every day at 4 a.m. to write because, she says, “If you start in the dark, the judges are all asleep.”
